message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be valuable to you. I'm thinking around $12,000 would be a fair price. What are your thoughts?
I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $12,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to negotiate. Could you do $10,500? It's a really good deal for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
